title: Miser's Purse, early 19th century
description: Crocheted black silk embroidered with areas of red, blue and yellow silk.  Further ornamented with beads of gold and cut steel.  Stylized leaf pattern and other decoration in the  same beads.  Gold and steel rings control side opening; tassels at each end of beads, twisted gold wire, and faceted cut steel balls.

tombstone.epitaph:
Miser's Purse, early 19th century.
early 19th century. Medium: silk, metal
Technique: crocheted. Gift of Mrs. Albert Blum. 1953-106-32.
